Potato___Early_blight.cause: Fungal infection caused by Alternaria solani.
Potato___Early_blight.treatment: Spray Mancozeb 75% WP @ 2g per liter of water.
Potato___Early_blight.prevention: Avoid overhead irrigation and remove infected leaves promptly.

Apple___Black_rot.cause: Caused by the fungus Diplodia seriata.
Apple___Black_rot.treatment: Use copper-based fungicides and remove infected fruit mummies.
Apple___Black_rot.prevention: Prune dead wood and disinfect pruning tools.

Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_.cause: Fungal disease caused by Puccinia sorghi.
Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_.treatment: Spray Mancozeb or Propiconazole as per recommendation.
Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_.prevention: Grow resistant hybrids and practice crop rotation.
